title: VirtualServiceDetail
description: Virtual Service Contact Details.(This datatype is created as per HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

xdm:channelType.title: ChannelType
xdm:channelType.description: The type of virtual service to connect to (i.e. Teams, Zoom, Specific VMR technology, WhatsApp).

xdm:addressUrl.title: Address Url
xdm:addressUrl.description: What address or number needs to be used for a user to connect to the virtual service to join. The channelType informs as to which datatype is appropriate to use (requires knowledge of the specific type).

xdm:addressString.title: Address Url
xdm:addressString.description: What address or number needs to be used for a user to connect to the virtual service to join. The channelType informs as to which datatype is appropriate to use (requires knowledge of the specific type).

xdm:additionalInfo.title: Additional Info
xdm:additionalInfo.description: Address to see alternative connection details.

xdm:maxParticipants.title: Max Participants
xdm:maxParticipants.description: Maximum number of participants supported by the virtual service.

xdm:sessionKey.title: Session Key
xdm:sessionKey.description: Session Key required by the virtual service.
